entry.data:
SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 17
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 3 BELOW THIS MORNING

CLEAR, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 8 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE MID 50S AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
